properties.body:
GULF OF GUINEA.
GABON.
DNC 01.
1. M/V GLEBE BULKER BOARDED BY PIRATES WHILE
   AT ANCHOR IN 00-16.60N 009-29.50E AT 020100Z MAY.
   PIRATES ESCAPED, THREE PERSONS REPORTED KIDNAPPED.
   VESSELS ARE ADVISED TO KEEP CLEAR OF THIS AREA AND
   TO EXERCISE EXTREME CAUTION. REPORTS TO
   IMB PIRACY REPORTING CENTER,
   PHONE: 603 2031 0014, FAX: 603 2078 5769,
   E-MAIL: IMBKL@ICC-CCS.ORG,
   PIRACY@ICC-CCS.ORG.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 091541Z MAY 23.
